paragraph: Steve Maslow (born October 17, 1944) is an American sound engineer. He won three Academy Awards for Best Sound and has been nominated for four more in the same category. He has worked on more than 200 films since 1978.
Maslow has won three Academy Awards for Best Sound and has been nominated for four more in the same category.
